content.question: In accordance with Roman social norms, the country people (agrestium, line 1) of this passage were of low social status primarily because they

choices.label: were veterans of the Roman army
had little wealth and political power
had never traveled to the city of Rome

content.answer: had little wealth and political power

unit.text: 2: Pliny's Letters: Eruption of Mt. Vesuvius

skill.text: 2.B: Describe historical and cultural contexts of Latin texts.
